wikipedia_page.main: Alan Morris (15 July 1954 – 31 December 1998) was an English footballer. He made an appearance in The Football League for Chester and also played at Wembley Stadium for Bangor City. He played as either a midfielder or striker.

response: *Alan Morris (character), fictional character in The Saga of Darren Shan

link_mentions.page: List of unsolved murders in the United Kingdom (1990s)
response: |Alan Morris, 44, had been a player for Chester City football club. He was fatally stabbed outside his home in Walker Street, Hoole, Chester on 31 December 1998. His partner stood trial for his death but was acquitted in December 1999. The pair had been seen arguing earlier that evening.
